subject: Baseball
Records and Achievements
lead_paragraph: In 1955, Whitey Ford pitched consecutive one-hitters — a rare feat few other pitchers have pulled off, the latest being R. A. Dickey of the Mets.
snippet: In 1955, Whitey Ford pitched consecutive one-hitters — a rare feat few other pitchers have pulled off, the latest being R. A. Dickey of the Mets.
